name: La Débandade
description:
La Débandade

 ( from french meaning "stampede" or "hurry-scurry" according to Google Translate)

It's a little top down shooter where you play a dice fighting against casino's chips.

Roll the dice to get a random bonus !

Commands:

  • Move : WASD or directional keys to move.
  • Aim : Mouse, 
  • Shoot : Left Click.
  • Roll and get bonuses : Space.

No Sound 

Developed  by Thomas Dangleterre for the GMTK Game Jam 2022.
